ch.usz.c3pro.c3_pro_android_framework.questionnaire.logic

Class ConditionalQuestionStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.researchstack.backbone.step.Step
      • org.researchstack.backbone.step.QuestionStep
        • ch.usz.c3pro.c3_pro_android_framework.questionnaire.logic.ConditionalQuestionStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConditionalStep, java.io.Serializable

    public class ConditionalQuestionStep
extends org.researchstack.backbone.step.QuestionStep
implements ConditionalStep, java.io.Serializable
    This Class extends the ResearchStack QuestionStep and implements the C3PRO ConditionalStep. ConditionalSteps provide the logic to add Steps to a ConditionalOrderedTask that are only shown to the user when certain conditions are met. The logic is derived from the FHIR Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemEnableWhenComponent element. ResultRequirements can be added to the step and will be verified every time before displaying the step to the user.
    See Also:

      • ConditionalQuestionStep

        public ConditionalQuestionStep(java.lang.String identifier,
                               java.lang.String title,
                               org.researchstack.backbone.answerformat.AnswerFormat format)
        Constructor. Returns an initialized ConditionalQuestionStep.
        Parameters:
        identifier - ID of the QuestionStep. Should be identical to the LinkId of the corresponding FHIR Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemComponent
        title - Question text that is displayed to the user.
        format - The AnswerFormat used to get the user input.
